venue.name: Ron Paul Literature Distribution at Anti-war Rally

item.description:
Introduce the only candidate, Ron Paul, who will end the Iraq war to the growing number of disillusioned Democrats and others protesting the war on the Boston Commons.

For reference on the latest developments regarding Ron Paul and the growing support for his candidacy see this ad put out by a coalition of anti-war groups:
http://www.huffington...

We will have a aerial banner at the rally
for Ron Paul "Ron Paul forPresident-Bring the
Troops Home Now!".
Please "Chipin": http://ronpaul.meetup...

The Oct. 27 rally rally is being organized by http://newenglandunit...
item.name: Literature Distribution for Ron Paul at Anti-war Rally
